Html:
Hello everybody.

First of all thx for GraphSharp. Well done.

I'm try to build a server app that is using the GraphSharp layout algorithms to calculate vertex and edge position and alignment.

The server returns a JSON object with the details and i render the output with jscript and html5. works without complications.

Are you planning to develop further algorithm and how far are you with the orthogonal layout?

Thanks in advance

Matthew
